text: Allakh vas sotvoril i predopredelil dlya vas razlichnyye sroki v zemnom mire. Sredi vas yest' takiye, kotorym on posylayet konchinu rano, a yest' takiye, kotoryye budut zhit' dolgo i dostignut samykh dryakhlykh let zhizni, kogda ikh sila i energiya postepenno oslabevayut, ikh kosti i nervy dryakhleyut, i oni teryayut silu, pamyat' i znaniya. Poistine, Allakh znayet sekrety Svoikh rabov, i On mozhet sovershat' vso, chto On pozhelayet
